TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but Batman stops him before he gets to you.

I wish for a big sandwich.

Granted, but the Heavy (from TF2) punches out all of your blood.

I wish for the truth.

Granted. You can't handle the truth.

I wish people didn't lie so much.

Granted. people tell the truth all around you,but suddenly russia people told us the truth that there is gonna be a world war III

I wish for pollution to convert into green clean air and energy.

Granted. Chlorine is green, a good disinfectant so it's clean, and it and has tons of energy to share with everything it touches.

I wish Super Monkey Ball on the 3DS wasn't such a let down.

Granted, it now blows UP.

I wish for a paradoxical granting of this wish.

Granted... I think? Possibly not. I dunno. Paradoxes are paradoxical.

I wish for some time to Photoshop some stuffz.

Granted! You photoshop a picture of an alien into a picture of you sitting at home. The CIA come for you and you are never heard from again....

I wish I had 360Ã‚Â° vision.

Granted. Your eyes require a temperature of 360 degrees Celsius to function.

I wish for circles.

Granted. The entire world is made out of circles, and only exists ini 2 Dimensions.

I wish for stuff. Nice stuff.

Granted, but bad burglars come to steal your stuff. Nice stuff.

I wish for the ability to memorize stuff quicker.

Granted, but the only word you can remember is stuff.

I wish for life to be found on Mars.

Granted. It is technologically advanced, carnivorous, and hostile.

I wish for pi to be exactly 3.

Granted. Circles are now hexagons, and every planet in existence explodes.

I wish for more activity.

Granted, but it's my activity in forum games! }:-)

I wish for the next corruption to be horribly wished.

Granted. You take lots of exercise, and you hate it.

I wish I could fart.

Granted, but only whenever there's people in a 3 meter radius around you.

I wish all cockroaches were sent to Mars (without me).

Granted, but everyone else goes to, leaving you alone.

I wish all Mars bars were sent to help starving cockroaches.

Granted, you now have a lot of starving, drunk cockroaches!

I wish I understood DC electricity

Granted- U now know all there is to know about DC current. Although you forgot what AC is and plugged ur DC stuff into the wall and it all went up in smoke.

I wish for everybody to get a day off work/school etc.

Granted. The apocalypse happens, thus giving everybody a "day off". Or more.

I wish an apocalypse would happen.

Granted. People still go to work, even though they're charred skeletons.

I wish for everybody to get a mineral.

Granted, everyone gets some Orpiment. The human species goes extinct.

I wish I was a law abiding citizen.

Granted. Living in Arstotzka, you are imprisoned for working with the EZZIC (However you spell it) (Even if you never worked with them).

You never see the light of day again.

I wish I could be a brony.

Granted. You are derided by 90% of the Internet for no reason other than liking something some others don't.

I wish people were more accepting of unusual pastimes.
